sentences.sContent: Half of the books are in German.
sentences.sCn: 这些书有一半是德语的。

phrases.pCn: 德国牧羊犬；阿尔萨斯狼犬；德国警犬（等于German police dog）
n. 德国牧羊犬；阿尔萨斯狼犬

trans.tranOther: the language used in Germany, Austria, and parts of Switzerland

trans.tranCn: 德国的；德国人的；德语的
trans.tranOther: relating to Germany, its people, or its language
